text: The 1884 New York Gothams season was the second season of that baseball franchise, eventually known as the San Francisco Giants. The team finished in fourth place, 22 games behind the pennant-winning Providence Grays. == Regular season == 1884 New York Gothams team photo === Season standings === === Record vs. opponents === === Roster === {| class="toccolours" style="font-size: 95%;" |- !
